HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 85 Kč or free for orders over 3490 Kč
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: The delivery date is indicative and depends on the current situation and capacity of the transport companies.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: PPL výdejní místa: 30 Kč. Zásilkovna: 50 Kč. Balík Do balíkovny: 55 Kč. Free delivery for orders over 3490 Kč.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery and parcel shop/pickup point delivery are available. 
PROVIDERS: PPL, Zásilkovna, and Česká pošta (via Balíkovna service). 
PRICING: Home delivery costs 85 Kč. Parcel shop delivery costs range from 30 Kč (PPL) to 55 Kč (Balíkovna). Free shipping is offered on all orders over 3490 Kč. 
COD: A cash on delivery surcharge of 20 Kč applies to all relevant orders. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The website does not specify delivery timeframes, stating they are estimates dependent on the carrier. No express or weekend delivery services are mentioned. There is no specific service for bulky items. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is consolidated on one page and is easy to understand. It clearly outlines the providers and their costs, including the free shipping threshold. However, it lacks detail regarding delivery speed, express options, and weekend services. The distinction between parcel shops and parcel lockers is not made.
